description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Carry out research and analysis to identify new market and business opportunities.
              
              - Communicate and negotiate with tenant. Develop plan and carry out the action. Implement sales &  marketing stragtegies.
              
              - Control leas agreement, annex, follow up OTL (Observe Tele-lease agreement), deposit of lease, management fee, fit out...
              
              - Be in charge of making report such as cash flow and other reports
              
              - Other tasks assigned by Estate Manager & SM Director.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Graduate university
              
              - Has experience working in hospitality industry or international property agency
              

              Quyền lợi được hưởng
              
              - Salary and Bonus
              
              - Meal Duty and Parking Fee
              

              Yêu cầu hồ sơ
              
              Contact: HR Department of Aon Vina,.Ltd Co.  23FL, Keangnam Hanoi Landmark Tower, E6, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
